entry.title: Men’s ZinTex Workout Hoodie - Midnight
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Activewear
Price: 65.00

● Made in Los Angeles
● Regular Fit
● Vintage Wash
● Snap Button Hood
● Front Pouch Pocket
● Rimmed Hem & Cuffs
● Heat-Sealed Reflective logos
● + ZinTex Technology

A warm-up essential, the ZinTex Workout Hoodie is made for performance with UV 50+, sweat and odor-proof protection exclusive to ZinTex fabric technology. Designed in a regular fit cut using a cozy vintage wash 100% cotton with heat-sealed reflective logos: featuring “Make the Most of Every Minute” on the hood. Get maximum functionality with heavy-duty snap buttons on the hood and front pouch pocket.

Materials: Body: 100% Cotton | Cuff: 93% Cotton, 7% Spandex
Model Height: 5'11" Size: Medium

entry.title: Men’s ZinTex Slim Fit Joggers - Midnight
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Activewear
Price: 60.00

● Made in Los Angeles
● Classic Tapered Fit
● Drawstring Waistband
● Side Zipper Pocket
● Towel Strap
● Heat-Sealed Reflective Logos
● + ZinTex Technology

The ZinTex Joggers are a classic staple to every workout wardrobe. Made for performance with UV 50+, sweat and odor-proof protection exclusive to ZinTex fabric technology. The adjustable drawstring waistband moves with you as you exercise. Clip your keys, AirPods, or a towel onto your waistband strap for easy access. Designed with heat-sealed reflective logos, four (4) open pockets and one (1) side zipper pocket.

Materials:
Body: 49% Polyester, 46% Cotton, 5% Spandex
Pocket: 92% Polyester, 8% Spandex

﻿﻿Model Height: 5'11" Size: Medium

entry.title: Men’s ZinTex Eco 7" Running Shorts (Concrete)
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Activewear
Price: 54.00

  • Antimicrobial Zinc Oxide
  • 7" Inseam 
  • Zipper Pockets
  • Sweat-Wicking
  • Odor-Repellent
  • Towel Strap

Get ready to take on high-impact workouts in the Zintex Eco Running Shorts. Lightweight and comfortable, these classic-fit shorts feature two pockets and a towel strap. The Zinc Oxide antimicrobial Fabric treatment sanitizes, provides UV protection against harmful sun rays, and blocks odor-causing microbes, keeping you fresh all workout long. Sustainably made using recycled plain weave fabric—all in a silky smooth, breathable design with a reflective logo print.

Materials: 86% Recycled Polyester + 14% Spandex

Model Height: 6'2" Size: Medium

entry.title: Magma Men’s Sauna Shorts
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Sauna Suits
Price: 45.00

  • Boosts weight loss, flexibility + muscle performance
  • Flat-lock stitching prevents chafing
  • Mesh crotch
  • Discreet zipper pocket
  • Reflective detailing for safety

The Magma sauna shorts for men bring high performance to a sleek, stylish pair of workout shorts. Constructed of heat-retaining neoprene, these thermal pants target your glutes, quads and lower abdomen to help you burn fat and cut weight quickly. With a discreet zipper pocket, interior drawstring waistband and smooth, anti-chafing seams, the Magma Men’s Sauna Shorts boost your workout no matter what your sweat style is.

Materials: 100% Neoprene

Care: Hand wash in cold water. Lay flat to dry out of direct sunlight. Do not dry clean, iron or tumble dry.

entry.title: Men’s Sauna Pants
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Sauna Suits
Price: 40.00

  • Promotes weight loss, muscle performance + flexibility
  • Mesh crotch
  • Anti-chafing seams
  • Small zipper pocket at the back waistband
  • Reflective detailing for safety

The NonZero Gravity Men’s Sauna Pants are designed with high-quality neoprene material that holds in heat and helps you sweat more. This unique heat-retention strategy is proven to help increase weight loss, improve cardiorespiratory fitness and boost flexibility and muscle performance.

With flat-lock stitching, a mesh crotch and a small zipper pocket, these pants work just as hard as you do, so you can make the most of every minute.

entry.title: Men’s Sauna Vest
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Sauna Suits
Price: 40.00

  • Aids in weight loss + muscle performance
  • Retains body heat to burn more calories
  • Flexible fit that moves with you
  • Easy, quick-release zipper
  • Flat-lock stitching eliminates chafing

 

The Men’s Sauna Vest takes your workout up a notch with high-performance material that holds in heat to help you burn more calories, increase muscle performance and maximize the intensity of your workout. Unlike traditional sauna suits, this vest is designed with flexible neoprene material that moves with you through every moment. Flat-lock stitching lays smooth against your skin, while the totally unique quick-release zipper pulls apart with one quick snap.

 

Materials: 100% Neoprene

 

Care: Hand wash in cold water. Lay flat to dry out of direct sunlight. Do not dry clean, iron or tumble dry.
